title: Simmons Prepared Foods, Inc. Recalls Chicken Products Due To Possible E. Coli O121 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, July 12, 2016 Simmons Prepared Foods, Inc., a Van Buren, Ark. establishment, is recalling approximately 5,850 pounds of frozen, heat treated, not ready-to-eat (NRTE) chicken products that may be contaminated with E. coli O121, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service...
